website_summaries.verdict: A super-sized mobile shower chair with plenty of features for those who desire extra functionality and security.
pros: Has four locking casters, sliding foot rest, built-in commode pail, and seat belt
Because of its 375-pound capacity, larger users feel safer
Chair is still lightweight enough to transport without difficulty
cons: Some users have found the chair too wide to use in some showers or bathtubs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, I weigh 290lbs I feel very secure when I take a shower, I have a walk in shower which makes it easy. I can roll in an out making it easy to sit in front of the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend Shower Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this shower chair. While it does require some assembly, it definitely was not difficult. The Memory Care Center was very excited to have this equipment to help with bathing/showering my husband, and commented on how sturdy it seems to be in spite of the fact that it is very easy to move because of its light weight. Delivery was speedy and without issues. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet
